author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-TransDigm Announces Kevin Stein As President And CEO
text:
April 30 (Reuters) - TransDigm Group Inc:
* TRANSDIGM ANNOUNCES KEVIN STEIN AS PRESIDENT AND CEO AND W. NICHOLAS HOWLEY AS EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN, APPOINTMENT OF NEW BOARD MEMBERS
* TRANSDIGM GROUP INC - AS PART OF ORGANIZATIONAL CHANGE, STEIN AND HOWLEY HAVE BOTH MODIFIED AND EXTENDED THEIR EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENTS THROUGH 2024
* TRANSDIGM GROUP INC - STEIN AND HOWLEY HAVE BOTH MODIFIED AND EXTENDED THEIR EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENTS THROUGH 2024 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
